name: Glide Flight Academy
about: Glide Flight Academy, authorized by the Bosnia and Herzegovina Directorate of Civil Aviation and the European Aviation Safety Agency, is dedicated to creating professional and safety-conscious flight crew members. Our mission is to provide the highest standard of instruction, ensuring a professional and enjoyable training experience. We offer training for both sailplane and airplane licenses, with comprehensive ground and flight training programs. Our experienced instructors guide students through 100 hours of ground training and a minimum of 15 hours of sailplane or 45 hours of airplane flight training. We focus on equipping our students for employment opportunities as corporate pilots or airline captains worldwide. With a commitment to safety and effectiveness, we prepare our students for the challenges of a career in aviation. Join us to embark on a journey to become a skilled and confident pilot.
